name: Skylands (itch) (Xed89)
description:
Skylands is a submission for the Weekly Game Jam for week 110, with the theme "Floating sky islands".
I hope you enjoy it as much as i did creating it! This is my first jam entry, so comments and suggestions are welcome, let me know what you like and don't like :D

Intro

You are a commander of an airship, sent to raid crystal mines in floating sky islands that are being occupied by enemies. You have to raid for 3 minutes to be successful.

Everything in the islands is destructible and yield crystals, including the enemy airships, so don't be shy using lasers!

Controls

The airship has two operators you can control with the following inputs:

"C" key: Change between navigation and shooting operators

Navigation operator:
W/S keys: Accelerate/Decelerate airship
A/D keys: Rotate airship left/right

Shooting operator:
Mouse: Aim
Left mouse button: Shoot
Right mouse button: Gather crystals
